reference.scope: X-RAY CRYSTALLOGRAPHY (2.65 ANGSTROMS) OF 27-392 IN COMPLEX WITH CHICKEN HS2ST1

comment.text: Involved in the high-affinity maltose membrane transport system MalEFGK. Initial receptor for the active transport of and chemotaxis toward maltooligosaccharides.
Permanently repressed by cold shock in a PNPase-dependent fashion.
Belongs to the bacterial solute-binding protein 1 family.

property.value: C:ATP-binding cassette (ABC) transporter complex, substrate-binding subunit-containing
P:cellular response to DNA damage stimulus
